name: I Love Hue Tour -Hue city motorbike Tour
description: This is a Hue motorbike tour that the customers will have a chance to explore the villages as Thuy Phu village, Thuy Bieu village, and visit orphanages in Hue city . The customers will try to be volunteers in the orphanages with the children as play games, teaching English, taking care the children, etc.
